name: SAS/DWH Expert (K09547)
description:
We’re looking for a SAS Expert who shall strengthen our Datawarehouse Team.

About the Department and the Role :

We’re looking for a SAS Expert who can dive into the DWH details and review the current setup of the DWH. The ideal candidate shall have the opportunity to participate in end-to-end projects in various domains. From business intelligence, data warehousing, data quality, data integration and big data to corporate performance management.

On the Candidate :

•        Be self-motivated and a problem solver;
•        Have a capacity to plan, analyse and structure information well;
•        Proactively identify, own and solve hard technical challenges;
•        Have a good verbal and written communication skills for presentations, demos and ongoing documentation.

PROFILE 

Must Have 

•        Highly experienced in Data Warehousing, solution architecture and data model
•        Very strong SAS knowledge 

o   20+ years of SAS experience (if possible)

o   SAS Base Certification Level 2 (Prog1-2-3 - Macro), SAS Stat

o   At least one SAS Reporting tool: ODS / SAS Graph / Stored Process / SAS Internet…

•        Experience with developing complex SQL queries and their optimization 
(e.g. indexes)

•        Experience with other databases, e.g. Oracle … and their access using SAS

Nice to have
•        Experience in the healthcare sector, pharmaceutical sector or a clinical environment is a plus

skills.name: SAS certification (e.g., SAS Certified Base Programmer for SAS 9)
